messages.subject: Relax! was Re: Intro
messages.msgSnippet: ... much of anything but math facts.  *But* it s still too stressful and overwhelming, which is why I feel we need to seriously relax right now.  : ) So give
messages.messageBody:
>>We really have already begun to relax a little more - we don't do formal
>>spelling, and history's just "real books" the kids choose, and we've
>>thrown out the idea of diagramming sentences and memorizing
much of anything but math facts. *But* it's still too stressful and
overwhelming, which is why I feel we need to seriously relax right now. :
)>>

So give yourself permission to relax! Take a break. Take a vacation from the
teaching and expectations of learning. It'll all be there when, and if, you
want to return to it. And while you're relaxing, keep reading here. You may
never want to go back. ;-)

Life is good.
~Mary
